entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 9.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening except north 30 km/h over southern sections overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
